title: Just a thought....but
body: Could we not have 30-60 minutes of anouncers talking between each game? there's like 8 games today...can we just watch them? how long does it take 5 kids to set up keyboards and mice? We just watched the game, we get it, put them talking on an alternative channel after each game like they do with Football and put the next game on up on the main channel, their insight is totally unnecessary at all levels.

replies.body: I don't mind some analysis and some talking, but I agree that sometimes (most of the times) they talk for too long. I'd hate to be one of the fans sitting in the actual arena for that long between games, listening to them talk.
Sjokz insight is needed, but otherwise; I agree.
